Bookvoice Windows distribution bundles third-party binaries.

Bundled components
- ffmpeg 7.1.1
  - Project: https://ffmpeg.org/
  - License family: GNU LGPL v2.1 or later / GNU GPL v2 or later (build-dependent)
  - Distribution note: Ship the exact upstream license text and preserve attribution.

- Poppler tools (pdftotext, pdfinfo) 24.08.0
  - Project: https://poppler.freedesktop.org/
  - License family: GNU GPL v2 or later
  - Distribution note: Ship the exact upstream license text and preserve attribution.

Compliance checklist
- Keep binary source/version provenance in release artifacts.
- Include upstream license texts in `licenses/`.
- Keep this notice file aligned with bundled versions.
